title: Google search/Gmail and Outlook not opening
content:
Google search on homescreen, Gmail & Outlook will not stay open. Closes intantly.
Have tried force stop/disable/enable/clear cache/restart. Up to date with version also.
Not working.
All other apps are ok, Google Chrome works ok also.
Strange that both suddently stopped.
Would prefer a solution as I'm not sure how to fix the Google problem without resetting the phone as there is no 'uninstall' option. Can uninstall and reinstall Outlook but prefer not to if there is a fix.
